name: timer-state
description: Enumerates the possible states of a BACnet timer (idle, running, expired).

values.name: idle
values.description: Indicates that the timer is idle and not currently running.

values.name: running
values.description: Indicates that the timer is currently running and counting down.

values.name: expired
values.description: Indicates that the timer has expired and completed its countdown.
